snippet.title: Perfect Dark With Mario Characters Release Trailer
snippet.description:
After over 3 years since the project was announced, Perfect Dark With Mario Characters has been released!
Obviously it hasn't been 3 years of constant work as I've released several mods in the meantime, but I have put in a lot of time & effort into this mod so I hope you enjoy it.

For those of you who are new: This is a mod that replaces all of the characters with ones from the Mario universe along with a variety of changes & improvements. Make sure to look at the README and Important Info text files for more information.

Also make sure to check out this video as it shows a lot of new changes that were made since the last time I uploaded a video about this project (contains spoilers), as well as explains why I'm releasing without Full Voice Acting which I said years ago that I would include:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Be8JnsRIbdM


Download Links for the Mod:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1S2xtYIeJ9k3jrDdr2K05TXTVToOSKdGg/view
https://www.moddb.com/mods/perfect-dark-with-mario-characters
http://n64vault.com/pd-misc:pd-with-mario-characters

Download Link for the Voice Acting Stuff:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EgIkSyg41PfDeeazhTnP4vj2ISI9BRGG/view

Download Link for the Mod + Voice Acting Stuff:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1S4_BXNo2SetQQYZOn4nMznXEddLj7eze/view

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/StupidMarioFan1
